app.description:
Automate your client communication with smart reminders and follow-ups.
The **Scheduled Notifications** app lets you automatically send personalized emails or text messages **before or after** appointments — no manual work required.
Use it to:
- Send **appointment reminders** a few hours or days before each booking.
- Schedule **follow-up messages** after appointments to thank clients, request reviews, or share next steps.
- Choose from flexible timing options like “2 hours before,” “1 day after,” or “at 7:00 PM the day before.”
- Customize message templates for email and SMS channels.
- Keep your clients informed, reduce no-shows, and build stronger post-appointment relationships — all automatically.
